factory.hpp

00001 #ifndef BOOST_SERIALIZATION_FACTORY_HPP
00002 #define BOOST_SERIALIZATION_FACTORY_HPP
00003 
00005 // MS compatible compilers support #pragma once
00006 #if defined(_MSC_VER) && (_MSC_VER >= 1020)
00007 # pragma once
00008 #endif
00009 
00010 // factory.hpp: create an instance from an extended_type_info instance.
00011 
00012 // (C) Copyright 2002 Robert Ramey - http://www.rrsd.com . 
00013 // Use, modification and distribution is subject to the Boost Software
00014 // License, Version 1.0. (See accompanying file LICENSE_1_0.txt or copy at
00015 // http://www.boost.org/LICENSE_1_0.txt)
00016 
00017 //  See http://www.boost.org for updates, documentation, and revision history.
00018 
00019 #include <cstdarg>
00020 #include <cstddef> // NULL
00021 
00022 #include <boost/preprocessor/control/if.hpp> 
00023 #include <boost/preprocessor/comparison/greater.hpp>
00024 #include <boost/preprocessor/facilities/empty.hpp>
00025 
00026 namespace std{
00027     #if defined(__LIBCOMO__)
00028         using ::va_list;
00029     #endif
00030 } // namespace std
00031 
00032 namespace boost {
00033 namespace serialization {
00034 
00035 // default implementation does nothing.
00036 template<class T, int N>
00037 T * factory(std::va_list){
00038     assert(false);
00039     // throw exception here?
00040     return NULL;
00041 }
00042 
00043 } // namespace serialization
00044 } // namespace boost
00045 
00046 #define BOOST_SERIALIZATION_FACTORY(N, T, A0, A1, A2, A3) \
00047 namespace boost {                                         \
00048 namespace serialization {                                 \
00049     template<>                                            \
00050     T * factory<T, N>(std::va_list ap){                   \
00051         BOOST_PP_IF(BOOST_PP_GREATER(N,0)                 \
00052             ,A0 a0 = va_arg(ap, A0);                      \
00053         ,BOOST_PP_IF(BOOST_PP_GREATER(N,1)                \
00054             ,A1 a1 = va_arg(ap, A1);                      \
00055         ,BOOST_PP_IF(BOOST_PP_GREATER(N,2)                \
00056             ,A2 a2 = va_arg(ap, A2);                      \
00057         ,BOOST_PP_IF(BOOST_PP_GREATER(N,3)                \
00058             ,A3 a3 = va_arg(ap, A3);                      \
00059             ,BOOST_PP_EMPTY()                             \
00060         ))))                                              \
00061         return new T(                                     \
00062             BOOST_PP_IF(BOOST_PP_GREATER(N,0)             \
00063                 ,a0                                       \
00064             ,BOOST_PP_IF(BOOST_PP_GREATER(N,1)            \
00065                 ,a1                                       \
00066             ,BOOST_PP_IF(BOOST_PP_GREATER(N,2)            \
00067                 ,a2                                       \
00068             ,BOOST_PP_IF(BOOST_PP_GREATER(N,3)            \
00069                 ,a3                                       \
00070                 ,BOOST_PP_EMPTY()                         \
00071             ))))                                          \
00072         );                                                \
00073     }                                                     \
00074 }                                                         \
00075 }                                                         \
00076 
00077 
00078 #define BOOST_SERIALIZATION_FACTORY_4(T, A0, A1, A2, A3) \
00079     BOOST_SERIALIZATION_FACTORY(4, T, A0, A1, A2, A3)
00080 
00081 #define BOOST_SERIALIZATION_FACTORY_3(T, A0, A1, A2)     \
00082     BOOST_SERIALIZATION_FACTORY(3, T, A0, A1, A2, 0)
00083 
00084 #define BOOST_SERIALIZATION_FACTORY_2(T, A0, A1)         \
00085     BOOST_SERIALIZATION_FACTORY(2, T, A0, A1, 0, 0)
00086 
00087 #define BOOST_SERIALIZATION_FACTORY_1(T, A0)             \
00088     BOOST_SERIALIZATION_FACTORY(1, T, A0, 0, 0, 0)
00089 
00090 #define BOOST_SERIALIZATION_FACTORY_0(T)                 \
00091     BOOST_SERIALIZATION_FACTORY(0, T, 0, 0, 0, 0)
00092 
00093 #endif // BOOST_SERIALIZATION_FACTORY_HPP
